  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:colos_sl/130242</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

            <entry>trubar1:colos_sl/130242</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Helikoidalno gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">Helicoidal motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiralförmige Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mouvement hélicoïdal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Movimento helicoidal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Movimento elicoidale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελικοειδής κίνηση</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Movimiento helicoidal</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Enakomerno gibanje električnega naboja v smeri magnetnega polja se vidi kot helikoidalno gibanje oziroma vijačnica.</string>
            <string language="en">Uniform motion of electric charge in direction of magnetic field is seen as helicoidal motion or helix.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">magnetno polje</string>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električni naboj</string>
            <string language="en">electric charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">helikoidalno gibanje</string>
            <string language="en">helicoidal motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">vijačnica</string>
            <string language="en">helix</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrika</string>
            <string language="en">electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konstante Bewegung der elektrischen Ladung in der 
Richtung von magnetischem fangen wird gesehen als 
spiralförmige Bewegung oder Schnecke auf.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le mouvement uniforme de la charge électrique dans
la direction du champ magnétique est vu en tant que le mouvement ou 
spirale hélicoïdal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O movimento uniforme da carga elétrica no sentido 
do campo magnético é visto como o movimento ou a hélice helicoidal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il movimento dell'uniforme della carica 
elettrica nel senso del campo magnetico è visto come movimento o 
elica elicoidale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ομοιόμορφη κίνηση της ηλεκτρικής δαπάνης στην 
κατεύθυνση του μαγνητικού πεδίου βλέπει ως ελικοειδής 
κίνηση ή έλικας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El movimiento uniforme de la carga eléctrica en 
la dirección del campo magnético se considera como el movimiento o 
hélice helicoidal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektrische Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">spiralförmige Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schnecke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Elektrizität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">champ magnétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">charge électrique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement hélicoïdal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">spirale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'électricité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">campo magnético</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">carga elétrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento helicoidal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hélice</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">carica elettrica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento elicoidale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">elettricità</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">έλικας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ηλεκτρική ενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
